Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th and Ellise due to, street blockage near 131st/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th and Ellise due to, street blockage near 131st/Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
